int CComboBox::setStaticOn ( )
 

int CComboBox::setStaticOff ( )
 

int CComboBox::isStatic ( )
 

If on, the list field is made static and the drop button is removed. If off, the list field is only visible when the drop button is pressed. Default is off.

int CComboBox::isDropBoxOpen ( )
 

Returns value > 0 if the drop box is currently open

int CComboBox::setFitLongestItemOn ( )
 

int CComboBox::setFitLongestItemOff ( )
 

int CComboBox::isFitLongestItem ( )
 

If on, the combo box sizes itself to fit the longest list item.

int CComboBox::setOpenAbove ( )
 

int CComboBox::setOpenBelow ( )
 

int CComboBox::isOpenAbove ( )
 

Selects if the list field will be placed above or below the text field. Note: if there isn't enough space between the text field and the edge of the screen the list may appear on the opposite side of the text field.

int CComboBox::setNumLines ( int numLines )
 

Sets the maximum number of list items that may be visible before scrollbars appear.

int CComboBox::setSelectedItem ( int position )
 

int CComboBox::getSelectedItem ( )
 

An index value indicating which list item given is currently selected.

Sets the width of the combobox so it can fit all items

void CComboBox::resizeToFitText ( char * text,
int num = 1 ) [virtual]
 

Sets the width of the combobox so it can fit <text> <num> times

Reimplemented from CText.

int CComboBox::setAutoAddOn ( int maxNumItems,
int position = 1 )
 

int CComboBox::setAutoAddOff ( )
 

int CComboBox::isAutoAdd ( )
 

If on, adds entries typed in the input field automatically to the list at <position>, if the combobox looses focus or the user hits return. If more then <maxNumItems> are in the list, the last entry is removed

void CComboBox::addDropBoxActivateCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback that the widget invokes when the drop box is activated.

void CComboBox::addDropBoxCloseCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback that is invoked when the user closes the combobox's list.
